column4: hey how come i cant play wmv files in firefox, i installed the mozilla-mplayer package
it worked on one video and then it never worked again
if you go to about:plugins  in firefox addressbar does mplayer show up?
you could do "pkill firefox" then ""mv ~/.mozilla ~/.mozilla-old" and restart firefox to see if its a profile thing
im assuming firefox2 is still under .mozilla and not .firefox now
~ just means /home/yourusername  you can use them interchangably. there is a direcotory containing config files in your home dir for most apps firefox is normally under .mozilla
when you remove the config directory the next time it starts it will create a new one. so its like you run it for the first time
no dice, it's still sittin there being dumb
it's supposed to load inside the video thing right?
ah. then if you had any bookmarks or aything id do pkill firefox and mv .mozilla-old .mozilla to get profile back.  yes
oh well im not too worried about the bookmark I lost
is there a w32 codec for edgy? i think I might install that, I installed dapper before
well im still in dapper so im not aware of any issues with edgy and the normal w32codecs but i have used different ones at times because of trouble playing .asf files in normal package
